pullRequest.title: Issue 18689 move index dynamic mappings from json to code
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR includes the following changes:

A new helper class was created to handle the logic used to map fields in Elasticsearch
ES Mapping for numbers, dates and text field types is now defined programmatically

commit.message: #18689 Moving logic that adds ES custom mappings to a helper class
